inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quantitative HBsAg <1,000 IU/ml OR HBV DNA <2x10^4 IU/mL at screening

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient has agreed not to take any other investigational drug or systemic anti-viral, cytotoxic, corticosteroid, immunomodulatory agents or Chinese traditional remedies unless clinically indicated

exclusion.criterion: Current treatment with nucleoside/nucleotide analogues or past treatment for Hepatitis B
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of cirrhosis documented by liver biopsy or transient elastography (score ≥ 10kpa)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active Co-infection with HIV antibody, HCV antibody or HDV antibody positivity
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of decompensated liver disease defined as a direct (conjugated) bilirubin >1.2x upper limit of normal (ULN), prothrombin time (PT) >1.5xULN , serum bilirubin <35g/L, or prior history of clinical hepatic decompensation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Absolute neutrophil count <1.5x10^9/L or Hemoglobin <12 g/L for men or <11 g/L for women, or platelet count < 90x10^9/L
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of depression or psychiatric disease
exclusion.label: not_met
